text: Malachi was a Jewish prophet in the Hebrew Bible. Malachi or Malachy may also refer to: ==Places== * Malachi, Ontario, Canada, an unincorporated community * Saint-Malachie, Quebec, Canada, a village ==People== * Malachi (given name) * Rabbi Malachi ben Jacob HaKohen (died 1780s), 17th-century Italian Rabbi * Malachi Cush (1980- ), Irish singer who records under the mononym "Malachi" * John Malachi (1919–1987), American jazz pianist * Saint Malachy (1095–1148) ==Arts, entertainment, and media== * Malachi (album), debut album of Malachi Cush * The Malachi Brothers, fictional characters and the main antagonists in the musical Happy Days ==Other uses== * Book of Malachi, a book of the Hebrew Bible ==See also== * Malachai (disambiguation)
title: Malachi (disambiguation)
